Name: Construction and maintenance of private sewers.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the construction and maintenance of private sewers.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Section 24-508 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding thereto a new subdivision f to read as follows: 
	f.  For the purposes of this section, the term “sewer” shall include any pumping station constructed by the owner of private property pursuant to plans approved by the department in accordance with subdivision a of this section, irrespective of when such pumping station was constructed. Where a pumping station constructed by a private property owner is connected to any sewer constructed by a private property owner but to which the city has taken title in accordance with subdivision d of this section, the city shall be required to forthwith take such actions as are necessary to acquire title to such pumping station.  
	§2.  The provisions of this local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment into law.

JH
